remarks: The inner Pasch axiom.  Take a triangle ` A C E ` , a point ` D ` on ` A C ` , and a point ` B ` extending ` C E ` .  Then ` A E ` and ` D B ` intersect at some point ` x ` .  Axiom A7 of [Schwabhauser] p. 12.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-Jun-2013.)
statement:
axpasch $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) /\ C e. ( EE ` N ) ) /\ ( D e. ( EE ` N ) /\ E e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) -> ( ( D Btwn <. A , C >. /\ E Btwn <. B , C >. ) -> E. x e. ( EE ` N ) ( x Btwn <. D , B >. /\ x Btwn <. E , A >. ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
$d E x $.
$d N x $.
